product_name: CliniqueChubby Stick Cheek Colour Balm Cream Blush
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Chubby Stick Cheek Colour Balm Cream Blush glides on creamy, mistake-proof cheek blush. Creates a healthy-looking glow in an instant.
details: DetailsBenefitsBuildable, long-wearing, portable cheek blush colorSwivels up, no sharpening requiredDermatologist testedAllergy testedFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOil-freeFragranceItem 2276489How To UseDot blush stick onto apples of cheeks. Fingertip-blend along cheekbones, toward hairline. Layer to build colour.IngredientsIsodecyl Isononanoate, Polyethylene, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate / Dicaprate, HDI / Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax / Candelilla Cera / Cire De Candelilla, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Diisopropyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Ozokerite, Squalane, Ceresin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Silica, Octyldodecanol, Phytosteryl Isostearate, Oryzanol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lauroyl Lysine, Lecithin, Synthetic Beeswax, Lauryl PCA, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylene / Propylene / Styrene Copolymer, Propylene Carbonate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tin Oxide, Butylene / Ethylene / Styrene Copolymer, Alumina, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510), Red 22 Lake (CI 45380), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dot blush stick onto apples of cheeks. Fingertip-blend along cheekbones, toward hairline. Layer to build colour.
ingredients: Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax / Candelilla Cera / Cire De Candelilla

reviews.headline: Love this blush
reviews.comments: This was a repeat buy but in a different shade. I love the ease of application and the staying power of this blush. I have it in three shades and love them all.

reviews.headline: My go to blush
reviews.comments: I have used this blush for years and I love it!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Was skeptical, as a big fan of MAC, dibs, and Fenty cream blushes I was not expecting to love this as much as I do!  Great for everyday wear, looks very natural and blends so easy!

reviews.headline: Love this blush!
reviews.comments: I was a little nervous using a creamy blush after years of powder blushes, but this chubby stick is so easy to use and blends with just your fingertips. I'm very fair and turning 50 this year so I didn't want anything too dark. This color is perfect and looks great!

reviews.headline: Love this blush
reviews.comments: This blush is the best, powder ones have talc in them and this one doesn't

reviews.headline: Yes love clinique
reviews.comments: Just wish the carried the color of powdered blush I use,

reviews.headline: Love product but packaging is deceiving.
reviews.comments: The size of the tube made me think there was 3-4" of product, but when I scrolled up all the way, I realized there was only 1.5". Very deceiving.

reviews.headline: I love this, it's a new classic for me!
reviews.comments: I have always worn Clinique, since I was 16. I am now far past that, but I still get many compliments on my skin, and natural makeup. So, I don't change much! However, I'm so happy I tried this! It's light, last all day, and is beautiful. It's now a new addition to my routine.

reviews.headline: I have used this for years and continue to love it.
reviews.comments: Perfect color!

reviews.headline: Beautiful natural color that applies nicely
reviews.comments: Beautiful natural color that applies nicely

reviews.headline: one of my least favorite cheek products ever
reviews.comments: I love Clinique-but this disappears as soon as you try to blend it. I've tried under and over many different bases to try to get this to work. You could wear this almost as a primer for powder blush, but what's the point?

reviews.headline: I love this! I can't believe I've never used it before!
reviews.comments:
I bought the Roly Poly Rosy yesterday, and after using Clinique products for the past 40 years, I can't believe I never tried this chubby stick before! Although it hasn't been around for 40 years, I regret not trying it when it first came out. I love it! This particular color is such a pretty pink, which complements my fair skin and dark blondish-brown hair beautifully.

I've found that applying it higher on my cheekbones instead of on the apples of my cheeks really enhances my facial structure. When I apply it to my apples, my face looks rounder and heavier, but when I focus on my cheekbones, it gives me a more angular look. I also dab it on my lips, and it looks stunning!

While I've used powder blush forever and still love it, I appreciate how this chubby stick gives me a lovely dewy finish. I'm 57 and any dewiness does help with my look! I will definitely be trying a couple more colors! Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Wonderful product. Would buy again.
reviews.comments: It goes on smooth and stay on.

reviews.headline: Creamy, Easy to Blend & Build
reviews.comments: I converted from powder and love! Very creamy and easy to blend with a brush. You can start with a light dewy layer and easily build if more color desired. I am fair with cool undertone and love the Peony for fall/winter and the Posy for summer. (If you swipe a heavy layer on your hand in the store, Posy may seem too bright, but if you start with a light layer on your face, it gives a lovely sun kissed look.)

reviews.headline: Chubby wins
reviews.comments: Purchasing this again. It lasts a long time and great product. Lasts all day

reviews.headline: The best blush!!
reviews.comments: Clinique chubby stick cream blush. I have used this for several years, in different shades. Love it!

reviews.headline: Worked great for my mature skin
reviews.comments: This is my first time using creme blush. Went on smooth and blended well. I wouldn't have picked amped up apple online so I'm happy that I went to the store and got help. Highly recommend. I hope they have a mini I can use for travel.

reviews.headline: Stick blush
reviews.comments: Great color, texture and wear!

reviews.headline: I WILL WEAR THIS UNTILL THE DAY I DIE
reviews.comments: absolutely love this blush. super blendable, forgiving, and easy to apply. also just beautiful color! very sheer but could be layered if you want more color. also lasts forever. i had my first one for about two years. just bought my second!!

reviews.headline: My mom's favorite blush product
reviews.comments: I helped my mom choose this product at the store when she wanted a change from her usual powder blush.  She now uses this blush exclusively, telling me that it's so quick and easy to apply.  Her first stick was a peachy color, but she now uses the "apple" shade, which is basically fool-proof on her medium complexion.  I've re-bought it for her twice since she started using this shade (she uses the product down to the stubs!).

media.headline: Great glow with no heavy make up look!

faceoff_positive.comments: I'd been using Chubby Sticks for eyes and lips and was excited to try the one for cheeks. I couldn't decide on a shade based on the onscreen colors, so I did a photo chat with a Clinique consultant and she recommended Plumped Up Peony for my fair skin with pink undertones. It's a sheer berry tint and looks great. These are so easy to apply. You can put the color right where you want and it blends really nicely. I won't be going back to powder blush anytime soon.
faceoff_positive.headline: A new favorite!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have to say I am very disappointed you have changed your stick blush. I have been using the older product for a long time, always bought 2 at a time. I was given the Chubby stick when I went to Nordstrom's Clinique counter and asked for 03 Rosy Blush. I was shocked when I got home to find what looked like a large crayon. I believe the diameter is smaller and it takes quite a few swiped to get color.

I dont feel it blends well at all. This formula is not as creamy and smooth as the other blush. The 03 color isnt the same, and it takes a few swipes to get any color at all on my cheeks. It used to be a no brainer, swipe and blend and out the door. I understand the nice silver tube of old was probably more expensive to manufacture, but wish you kept the same color range and product formula and had and put it into the crayon tube you now have. I don't know if the good grades have come from customers who havent used the previous tube blush and maybe they dont know any better. I dont understand why, as they say "if it aint broke, dont fix it." I always have bought Clinique cosmetics, but I wont frequent your counter any more. I see the old product sells online by rogue sellers for up to $59.00!!! For the price to go that high, customers are still clambering for it. Bring it back!
faceoff_negative.headline: Very disappointed you changed this product.

rollup.name: Chubby Stick Cheek Colour Balm Cream Blush
